dataset_info: Dataset used in graph database for analysis and recommendation
genres_rated: Donut plot of genre wise percentage rating
movies_above_4: Bar plot of genre rated above 4
similar_user: Network graph using pyviz shows similar user of input user and movie counts
similar_user_graphistry: Network graph using Graphistry shows similar user of input user and movie counts
recommendation: Movies that user has not watched and might like it
